lessons.title: 1. Wh-questions
lessons.lessonInfo: Wh-questions are questions that typically start with 'what', 'where', 'when', 'why', or 'how'. They are used to gather specific information.

lessons.title: 2. Yes/No questions
lessons.lessonInfo: Yes/No questions are questions that can be answered with a simple 'yes' or 'no'.
